nodes.text: The Tarkin Memorial Conference Center was located in Eriadu City on the Outer Rim planet of the same name. Eriadu was the homeworld of Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin, after whom the center was named.

The Tarkin Memorial Conference Center was designed in a roughly circular pattern around the main conference room which also served as a banquet hall. A large hallway surrounded the main conference room with access to two smaller conference rooms, a command center, a large kitchen with pantry, restrooms, two lounges, a large reception area, and a security office with armory. There were also two detached elevated dining rooms.

When the Empire's most well-to-do citizens were scheduled to conduct highly secretive negotiations at the Tarkin Conference Center, an ambitious Black Sun enforcer tried to impress his bosses by robbing as many attendees of the meeting as possible. He offered a generous percentage to any thug or crew that could successfully steal from the highest number of attendees.
